name: Zorg And Wonders Of The Modern World
name_original: Zorg And Wonders Of The Modern World
description:
Zorg the Alien from the planet GJ 667 C f is on a scout mission to Earth. There he meets some interesting people like Cathy the Crazy Cultist, Jake (a dead guy) and Donald Trump. If you got only 10 minutes then this is your game! Here are some nice comments so far:

"If the avatar has green tentacles then it gotta be a great game!" - Timmy, 5 years old

"Absolutely hated it. Probably made by some democrat." - Hank

"What, no laser guns? Boring!" - Rick

"Unreal! The UFO looks just like the one I saw on my field!" - Marge R.

"Zorg, eh? Now that's an original name for an alien game. " - D. T.

"Didn't get the jokes." - Harvey
